text: Jim Murphy Jr. is a former American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at Merrimack College in North Andover, Massachusetts from 2003 to 2007. Murphy played college football as a quarterback at Northeastern University in Boston. He played for one season for the Barcelona Dragons of NFL Europe. He spent part of two seasons on the New England Patriots roster. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Barcelona Dragons players Category:Merrimack Warriors football coaches Category:New England Patriots players Category:Northeastern Huskies football players
title: Jim Murphy (American football)
